source:
# The scource files are uncommented for the Productionized run (Remove the `#` when troubleshooting these scripts)

#dboXTSD_XA_ASR = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/SAP/dboXTSD_XA_ASR.parquet', format='parquet')
#dboXTSD_XA_ASR.createOrReplaceTempView("dboXTSD_XA_ASR")

#dboXTSD_XA_DEP = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/SAP/dboXTSD_XA_DEP.parquet', format='parquet')
#dboXTSD_XA_DEP.createOrReplaceTempView("dboXTSD_XA_DEP")

F_FIXED_ASSETS_CURRENT_VALUE = spark.sql("""
SELECT `Asset_Number`, 
		   `Asset_Group`, 
		   `Asset_Type`, 
		   `Purch_Date`, 
		   `Orig_Inv_DocEntry`, 
		   Description, 
		   `Unit_Cost`, 
		   `Net_Asset_Value`, 
		   Status, 
		   `Disposal_Date`,
		   `Depr_Period`,
		   `Remaining_Life`, 
		   PrcCode, 
		   PrjCode, 
		   `Acc_Asset`,
		   `Acc_AccuDepr`, 
		   `Acc_Depr`, 
		   `Acc_AssetDisp`, 
		   `Acc_ExtrItem`, 
		   `Calc_Rem_Life`, 
		   doDepr, 
		   BarCode, 
		   Supplier, 
		   `Residual_Value`, 
		   SerialNumber, 
		   `Full_Asset_Life`, 
		   `Orig_Unit_Cost`, 
		   `Acc_RevalDiff`, 
		   `Depr_Start_Date`, 
		   `Parent_Number`, 
		   "City Logistics New" as Company
FROM dboXTSD_XA_ASR
""")
#F_FIXED_ASSETS_CURRENT_VALUE.show()
F_FIXED_ASSETS_CURRENT_VALUE.createOrReplaceTempView("F_FIXED_ASSETS_CURRENT_VALUE")

F_FIXED_ASSETS_DEPRECIATION = spark.sql("""
SELECT `Asset_Number`, 
		   `Depr_Date`, 
		   `Depr_Type`, 
		   `Depr_Days`, 
		   `GROSS_AV`, 
		   `NAV_Bef_Depr`, 
		   `Depr_Value`, 
		   `NAV_Aft_Depr`, 
		   JnlID, 
		   `Asset_Grp`, 
		   "City Logistics New" as Company
FROM dboXTSD_XA_DEP
""")
#F_FIXED_ASSETS_DEPRECIATION.show()
F_FIXED_ASSETS_DEPRECIATION.createOrReplaceTempView("F_FIXED_ASSETS_DEPRECIATION")
